short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check PESCO (KPK) bill online. Get duplicate copy of your latest Pesco wapda bill now.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is developed for the PESCO KPK electricity consumers who can check their latest wapda bill, download duplicate pesco bill, and/or print the bill. 

PESCO consumers from Peshawar, Swat, Bannu, Hazara, Swabi and Mardan cities can use this extension if they have to check their electricity bill amount and due date.
